actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: To provide for the withholding of contributions to certain organizations that assist Iraq, Iran, Libya, and Cuba.

summary.text: Requires the President to withhold assessed and voluntary contributions of the United States to any international financial institution that furnishes assistance to Iraq, Iran, Libya, or Cuba.

titles.title: To provide for the withholding of contributions to certain organizations that assist Iraq, Iran, Libya, and Cuba.
